channel.title: ASF Jira
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HIVE-13111] Fix timestamp / interval_day_time wrong results with HIVE-9862
item.description: Fix timestamp / interval_day_time issues discovered when testing the Vectorized Text patch.
item.summary: Fix timestamp / interval_day_time wrong results with HIVE-9862

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are not closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:

ATTACHMENT ID: 12794943 - PreCommit-HIVE-TRUNK-Build

For TestMiniTezCliDriver.testCliDriver_vector_interval_arithmetic – I forgot to update the Tez Q file output after adding a LIMIT clause.

TestMiniLlapCliDriver.testCliDriver_llap_udf has failed for 8 builds.

TestCliDriver.testCliDriver_auto_sortmerge_join_2 didn't fail on my laptop. I'm not sure what to think of that failure.
